channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yellow no parking bollard left at entrance to Whitethorn drive adj to Bouncers Lane, 19th November
item.description:
Just at entrance to Whitethorn drive on kerbside
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Whitethorn Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Multiple pot holes, 19th November
item.description:
Harp Hill Drivers are swerving in very dangerous places to avoid the multitude of pot holes in the road. Multiple times a close accident and one awaiting to happen. Terrible for vehicles wheel alignment and suspension/tyres. I do this school run every day with two young children in the car. Itâ€™s really not acceptable as there are multiple logs and nothing has been actioned. I have also called and logged this as an emergency based on near accident this morning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf litter on road causing dangerous conditions, 19th November
item.description:
On Glenfall Way - from hartlebury way junction to London road junction with Glenfall way there is copious amounts of leaf litter on the road which is causing dangerous driving conditions with the wet and ice. Road needs sweeping both side but this needs to be completed avoiding the school drop off/pick up time as the parked cars mean the access to the leaf litter is blocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenfall Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road marking white lines or studs problem, 19th November
item.description:
customer states markers are not there at junction (may be worn away) AHR requests inspection for safety (related to enquiry 11498633)
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Road marking white lines or studs

item.title: Dog foul, 19th November
item.description:
Please clean up the dog foul on the high street, thanks! :)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35-37, High Street, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Broken glass on cycleway, 19th November
item.description:
I'm afraid there is often broken glass along here. It needs a careful sweep please, as there are bits of glass all along. Thanks for picking this up. It's really appreciated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 19th November
item.description:
Roadclosure. 28 days c/way pothole 1400x1000x40mm stats required number 1 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large and Deep Potholes right at the entrance to Sixways Carpark, Charlton Kings Cheltenham, 19th November
item.description:
The potholes are in the wheel tracks of vehicles entering between the gate posts of the above carpark. They are very deep and no vehicle entering the carpark can avoid them - and they are such that damage to vehicles is more than possible. Having had to use this carpark frequently lately, it is clear that they really need urgently to be filled in. They are also a trip hazard to pedestrians who may also use this entrance especially older people as the ground between the posts is also quite broken up. Please can these be repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashley Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 19th November
item.description:
Customer reports leftover barriers/sandbags have been left leaning against the PGR on the island. Asking if they can be removed as they keep blowing over in the wind.
Report on FixMyStreet
